game.s_dis: Parkour Race is a fast-paced 3D stickman runner where players vault, flip, and race through city rooftops, using parkour skills to beat rivals and claim victory.
game.l_dis:
Parkour Race ‚Äì Stickman City Runner

Parkour Race is a thrilling 3D parkour runner game where you control a stickman racing across skyscraper rooftops. With wall-runs, flips, vaults, and stylish moves, the goal is to be the fastest to the finish line while mastering speed and agility.

What is Parkour Race?

Parkour Race combines speedrunning with parkour tricks in a competitive race format. Players dash across futuristic cities, leap over rooftops, and pull off flips to maintain momentum. You can also unlock cosmetic skins, use power-ups, and take on daily challenges.

How to Play Parkour Race?

  • Run & Jump: Sprint across rooftops and time your jumps to clear gaps.
  • Perform Tricks: Wall-run, vault, and flip to gain style and speed.
  • Race Rivals: Compete against AI or online opponents in fast-paced races.
  • Use Power-Ups: Boost your speed and gain an edge in tough levels.
  • Unlock Skins: Customize your stickman with stylish outfits.
  • Daily Challenges: Complete missions for rewards and upgrades.

Why Play Parkour Race Unblocked?

Parkour Race Unblocked lets you enjoy smooth, adrenaline-filled parkour action anytime, anywhere‚Äîat school, work, or home‚Äîwithout restrictions.

Key Features

  • 3D Rooftop Parkour: Dynamic stickman racing with flips and vaults.
  • Multiplayer Modes: Race against friends or players worldwide.
  • Power-Ups: Gain boosts to outpace your rivals.
  • Customization: Unlock skins and personalize your runner.
  • Daily Challenges: Keep gameplay fresh with new goals.

The Ultimate Rooftop Runner
